nav.div: Weakley County Schools » For Staff » Employee Rights - Coronavirus Response

div.div:
The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19. These provisions will apply from April 1, 2020 through December 31, 2020. To view document, click here:
FFCRA_Poster_WH1422_Non-Federal.pdf

8319 Highway 22, Suite A, Dresden, TN 38225
Phone 731.364.2247 | Fax 731.364.2662
